attributes.action: Build a fleet of Jedi X-wings
attributes.additional_details:
The Americans have just voted a similar e-petition to the White House to build a death star!

https://petitions.whitehouse.gov/petition/secure-resources-and-funding-and-begin-construction-death-star-2016/wlfKzFkN

They got all the signatures they needed!

http://www.washingtontimes.com/blog/inside-politics/2012/dec/13/death-star-petition-white-house-website-succeeds/

We need a strategic defence to combat this. The RAF are going to need some x-wings.
